resolution: Diagnostic analysis found 1 accessible bucket (demo-superops-bucket) in us-west-1 region. Possible root causes identified: wrong AWS account, bucket name changes, lost IAM permissions, or incorrect region. Resolution steps include: 1) Verify exact bucket name with user 2) Confirm AWS account ownership 3) Check IAM permissions 4) Verify correct region (us-west-1). Current accessible bucket is demo-superops-bucket in us-west-1 region.

query: hauntedbucket s3 bucket is not connecting
resolution: S3 bucket 'hauntedbucket' diagnosis complete. Key findings: 1) Bucket exists but returns 403 Access Denied 2) Unable to list bucket/get location due to permissions 3) Bucket not visible in account list. Resolution requires: Verify AWS credentials, review IAM permissions (s3:GetBucketLocation, s3:ListBucket, s3:GetObject), check bucket policy, verify cross-account access.
